However, in the primary process, in the nomination process, it's clearly helping him. It's taking attention away from the other candidates. But the bigger issue was simply saying Trump is leading in the polls, is that the media is buying into a self, basically a reinforcing narrative. What happens here is, is the media give all the attention to Trump. sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03

Il rivenditore afferma che giocattoli come Lego, carte Pokémon, giochi da tavolo e puzzle sono tra quelli più popolari tra gli adulti.
